column5: Had a great morning with my bro and Terry. They even posed for a christmas shot.
Oh and good seeing you again Roger.Nice fella that Roger is.
Thought they would have at least been on Mrs. Claus's knee or somethin...
LOL  I knew I should have left the wallet at home.....  nice to meet your bro and I finally meet Roger at BPS   good way to spend a rainy morning
Nice to meet you terry and roger always nice to meet people from the board  rob
......"Merry Christmas to memart and Terry".......  hmmmm, so does that mean you don't want to wish a Merry Christmas to the other 2450 of us OFNers' Brian ??
Lew,I will be at BPS to take pic,s from 9 am til close.LOL   Ok,Merry Christmas to all OFC members.
Dang, we were at BPS today too.  Didn't see any of you's riff raff tho  Merry Christmas back atcha B.  Joey

Finally got to meet the guy that has made me spew my coffee all over the keyboard more than once Great finally meeting you Terry........................................................and MeMart.......................Oh yah, great seeing you again too Brian Those other two should be a little more picky about who they hang out with!!
riff raff,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,That would explain why thier was a cover charge just for us.
